information: The company ROMAN LECHNER GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1987, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Textile plants, Structural work, and Finishing work industries. It is based in Kötz, Germany.
